svg.desc: Provides a list of historical data as a table.
svg.title: Historylist (small)

atv:parameter.name: starttime
atv:parameter.desc: start time (Value in seconds to go back from the current time)

atv:parameter.name: range_filter_mode
atv:parameter.config: From - To=0; From - Number of rows=1; To - Number of rows=2
